Description: On I-81 at mile marker 50.3 in the County of Smyth, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The north right lane and right shoulder are closed. Traffic backups are approximately 2.0 miles.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On US-258 in the County of Isle Of Wight, in the vicinity of Cut Thru Rd; Five Forks Rd; Rt. 606E/W (Isle of Wight County), near 10333 Five forks rd, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. All east lanes are closed. All west lanes are closed.
